full_summary:
# Upgrades to a 67 GHz R&S Signal Generator
## Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: NPP20230307
* Solicitation Publication Date: February 21, 2023
* Closing Date for Tenders: March 7, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* Expiration Date: March 7, 2023

## Background
Industry Canada invites bids to upgrade a 67 GHz R&S signal generator. This solicitation is issued against the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC (category 3.45 Signal Generators and Analyzers).

## Description of Goods
The successful bidder must provide the required goods, as specified on the equipment list (Annex A), including equivalent products with manufacturers on the supply arrangement.

## Evaluation Criteria
Submissions must demonstrate technical compliance with the requirements presented in the solicitation and at Annex A. The bidder must quote firm prices in Canadian dollars, DDP (destination) with freight charges included.

## Bidder Selection
The bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The lowest priced responsive bid on an aggregate basis will be recommended for award of a contract.

## Contract Payment and Delivery
The contractor will be paid the firm prices as specified in the contract, inclusive of taxes. Delivery is requested to be completed by March 31, 2023.

## Annex A: Equipment List
The required equipment includes, but is not limited to:

* Extension of baseband from 1 GHz to 2 GHz RF bandwidth, Model - SMW-K527
* Additional white gaussian noise, Model - SMW-K62
* Enhanced noise generation, phase noise, impulsive noise, Model - SMW-K810
* 5G NR Version 15, Model - SMW-K144
* 5G NR Version 16, Model - SMW-K148
* 5G NR Version 17, Model - SMW-K171
* EUTRA/LTE Version 8, Model - SMW-K55
* Extension of ARB memory to 2 Gsamples, Model - SMW-K515
* Ultra low noise reference input/output, Model - SMW-K703

## Important Dates
* Closing Date for Tenders: March 7, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* Delivery Date: March 31, 2023

## Contact Information
Contact Kelly Stauffer
